TextLibrary.Text: Princess Serephine
I've just talked to Elistara.
I've just talked to Elistara.
I've just talked to Elistara.
I've just talked to Elistara.
You have that worried look again. What's wrong?
You have that worried look again. What's wrong?
You have that worried look again. What's wrong?
You have that worried look again. What's wrong?
The Elven Scouts have spotted a legion of Imperial Guards approaching along the coast.
The Elven Scouts have spotted a legion of Imperial Guards approaching along the coast.
The Elven Scouts have spotted a legion of Imperial Guards approaching along the coast.
The Elven Scouts have spotted a legion of Imperial Guards approaching along the coast.
Imperial Guard? Your father sent them all this way after you?
Imperial Guard? Your father sent them all this way after you?
Imperial Guard? Your father sent them all this way after you?
Imperial Guard? Your father sent them all this way after you?
He is a persistent man. But I am not afraid - not with you protecting me.
He is a persistent man. But I am not afraid - not with you protecting me.
He is a persistent man. But I am not afraid - not with you protecting me.
He is a persistent man. But I am not afraid - not with you protecting me.
Princess, you don't need to constantly flatter me to get your way.
Princess, you don't need to constantly flatter me to get your way.
Princess, you don't need to constantly flatter me to get your way.
Princess, you don't need to constantly flatter me to get your way.
I'm sorry. It's my nature. You WILL help me though, won't you?
I'm sorry. It's my nature. You WILL help me though, won't you?
I'm sorry. It's my nature. You WILL help me though, won't you?
I'm sorry. It's my nature. You WILL help me though, won't you?
Of course I will.
Of course I will.
Of course I will.
Of course I will.
